snippet: Rehabilitation centers have added Nintendo’s Wii golf game as a tool in therapy sessions to assist patients with motion and coordination skills and also keep them motivated.
lead_paragraph: Rehabilitation centers have added Nintendo’s Wii golf game as a tool in therapy sessions to assist patients with motion and coordination skills and also keep them motivated.

headline.seo: Physical Therapists Use Wii Golf to Treat Patients
headline.main: Physical Therapists Turn to Wii Golf
headline.print_headline: Therapists Say Patients’ Balance and Motion Improve With Help of Wii Golf
